general.description: M.K., a rather oddly named planet, holds a special place in many Soromid's hearts. It is the closest inhabited world to Sorom that survived the Incident. As such, it has quickly developed a fairly advanced market for trade with foreign pilots.
general.bar: Both Soromid and non-Soromid frequent this spaceport bar. As Wildwood Station is more of a service utility than a real community, M.K. is often the first real Soromid port most new traders visit. It is therefore here they get their first taste of a full-fledged Soromid sociÃ«ty. It's not uncommon to find young pilots looking at the surroundings with a mixture of wonder and nervousness.
